main event: An observation of an object displaying a pendant-like motion for approximately 20 minutes before shooting straight up at a terrific rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 20 minutes,The object displayed a pendulum-like action,The object made no noise and showed no means of propulsion,The sighting was reported by three military personnel,The sky was clear with unlimited visibility during the observation.
witness description: three military personnel: S/SGT Richard W County, A/1C James M Barren, and A/2C Edward P Robinson
